meanings.sent1: The cold wind made my skin feel tinglier.
meanings.sent2: The spicy food left a tinglier feeling on my tongue.
meanings.sent3: The tickling feather was tinglier than expected.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the surprise made her heart feel tinglier.
meanings.sent5: The electric shock was so tinglier, it felt like tiny ants crawling on my skin.

meanings.definition: More tingling or intense in sensation
meanings.sent1: The new lotion had a tinglier effect on my hands.
meanings.sent2: The excitement of the roller coaster ride grew tinglier with each loop.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist made the movie even tinglier.
meanings.sent4: The suspense in the air became tinglier as the clock ticked on.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the flowers became tinglier as the sun set.
